title: I feel like the kassadin vu was terrible.
body: I prefered the old kassadin. Right now he looks weird, his arms are perpendicular to his body, he is way too skinny, he exaggerates his spells too much, and overall he is ugly.

replies.body: If you preferred the old Kassadin, it's because you're on the Ultra low preset and probably didn't even notice the SR update. Or you're insane.
The only thing I really prefer is the attack animation.
i feel the animation is just a bit slower when i ult e like just feel tho
Y3p but its only a feel with the time you start feel "normal"
